itunes:title: Episode 284 - What's REALLY Happening At The Border.
title: Episode 284 - What's REALLY Happening At The Border.
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson sits down for a special one on one show with Drinkin' Bros OG Vincent "Rocco" Vargas to discuss his time as a border patrol agent and what is actually going on with the border crisis.  The media isn't reporting what is actually happening a...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down for a special one on one show with Drinkin' Bros OG Vincent "Rocco" Vargas to discuss his time as a border patrol agent and what is actually going on with the border crisis.  The media isn't reporting what is actually happening and Rocco called in to stand up for his fellow agents down there.  Great episode.

Buy Ross' New Book "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It"

content:encoded:
Ross Patterson sits down for a special one on one show with Drinkin' Bros OG Vincent "Rocco" Vargas to discuss his time as a border patrol agent and what is actually going on with the border crisis.  The media isn't reporting what is actually happening and Rocco called in to stand up for his fellow agents down there.  Great episode.

Buy Ross' New Book "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It"
